name: The Treasures of Mystery Island 3: The Ghost Ship
summary: Stop fate in its tracks to rescue a tropical paradise in The Treasures of Mystery Island - The Ghost Ship, a harrowing journey with little time to spare. A mysterious tidal wave that once sunk a cruise ship now threatens the isle of Santa Rossa. Help the island's shaman avert this disaster by solving the mystery behind the ill-fated ship's ghosts.
